verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> you have rejected <S%H2186><s%> us. <S%H6555><s%> You have broken us down. <S%H599><s%> You have been angry. Restore us, <S%H7725><s%> again.
You have made the land <S%H776><s%> tremble. <S%H7493><s%> You have torn <S%H6480><s%> it. <S%H7495><s%> Mend its fractures, <S%H7667><s%> for it quakes. <S%H4131><s%>
You have shown <S%H7200><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> hard things. <S%H7186><s%> You have made us drink <S%H8248><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> that makes us stagger. <S%H8653><s%>
You have given <S%H5414><s%> a banner <S%H5251><s%> to those who fear <S%H3373><s%> you, <S%H5127><s%> that it may be displayed because <S%H6440><s%> of the truth. <S%H7189><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
So that your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered, <S%H2502><s%> save <S%H2502><s%> with your right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and answer us. <S%H6030><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> from his sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%> "I will triumph. <S%H5937><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and measure out <S%H4058><s%> the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine, <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh is mine. <S%H669><s%> Ephraim also is the defense <S%H4581><s%> of my head. <S%H7218><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my scepter. <S%H2710><s%>
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my wash basin. <S%H5518><s%> I will throw <S%H7993><s%> my shoe <S%H5275><s%> on Edom. <S%H123><s%> I shout in triumph <S%H7321><s%> over Philistia. <S%H6429><s%>"
Who will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4692><s%> city? <S%H5892><s%> Who has led <S%H5148><s%> me to Edom? <S%H123><s%>
Haven't <S%H430><s%> you, God, rejected us? <S%H430><s%> You don't go out with our armies, God.
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> against the adversary, <S%H6862><s%> for the help <S%H8668><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly, <S%H2428><s%> for it is he who will tread down <S%H947><s%> our adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
